{{Description|This is a little embarrassing, but though the elemental lifeforms birthed through this procedure dissipate very rapidly, they are incredibly useful when adventuring. Even failed experiments can have practical applications.}}
'''Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308''' is [[Sucrose]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|4}}
* Skill DMG can hit ally objects such as [[Baron Bunny]], [[Guoba Attack|Guoba]], [[Yuegui]], etc. and trigger [[Swirl]] reactions if the hit object is affected by an element.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Sucrose|talent=Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308|ascension|2|Mollis Favonius}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>

* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|Flawless Alchemistress}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Alchemania}}
